entries.title: F1 champ Max Verstappen ragequits virtual Le Mans race, calls it a 'clown show'
entries.description: This weekend's 24 Hours of Le Mans Virtual was plagued with technical issues and DDoS attacks.

entries.title: Steam's second-most-anticipated game is finally going to show some footage just a month before it launches
entries.description: The Day Before, one of the most wishlisted games on Steam, is set to come out on March 1 and we still know virtually nothing about it.

entries.title: Biden wants to hold big tech accountable for the 'experiment they are running on our children'
entries.description: US president Joe Biden makes a call for social media companies to take more responsibility over the "toxic online echo chambers" we're exposed to.

entries.title: Sovereign Syndicate is shaping up to be steampunk Disco Elysium
entries.description: "I don't want to be this kind of animal anymore," says Disco Elysium. "Want to be a minotaur then?" says Sovereign Syndicate.
